channel.title: Code, Drug Discovery on Walter Virany
channel.description: Recent content in Code, Drug Discovery on Walter Virany

item.title: Foundations of Bayesian Optimization
item.description: Background Goal is to maximize some function $f$, i.e., find $$ \begin{align*} x^* \in \arg \max_{x \in \mathcal{X}} \end{align*} $$ $f$ need not be analytic (i.e., can’t write it down), nor computable - we just need some access to information at specified points

item.title: Generating Synthesizable Molecules (1/2)
item.description: Part 1: Projecting Molecules into Synthesizable Chemical Spaces
